parameters.name: vehicleName
parameters.description: The unique ID of the vehicle to update.

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Static information about a vehicle in a key-value pair. For example: "engineType" : "1.3 L R2" (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: attributeUpdateMode
parameters.description: The method the specified attributes will update the existing attributes on the vehicle. Use Overwite to replace the vehicle attributes with the specified attributes. Or use Merge to combine all attributes. This is required if attributes are present in the input.

parameters.name: stateTemplatesToAdd
parameters.description: Associate state templates with the vehicle. (dict) --- The state template associated with a vehicle. State templates contain state properties, which are signals that belong to a signal catalog that is synchronized between the Amazon Web Services IoT FleetWise Edge and the Amazon Web Services Cloud. The unique ID of the state template. The update strategy for the state template. Vehicles associated with the state template can stream telemetry data with either an onChange or periodic update strategy. periodic (dict) --- Vehicles associated with the state template will stream telemetry data during a specified time period. The length of time between state template updates. A unit of time. A number of time units. onChange (dict) --- Vehicles associated with the state template will stream telemetry data when there is a change.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: The unique ID of the state template.

nested_params.name: stateTemplateUpdateStrategy
nested_params.description: The update strategy for the state template. Vehicles associated with the state template can stream telemetry data with either an onChange or periodic update strategy.

nested_params.name: periodic
nested_params.description: Vehicles associated with the state template will stream telemetry data during a specified time period.

nested_params.name: stateTemplateUpdateRate
nested_params.description: The length of time between state template updates.

nested_params.name: onChange
nested_params.description: Vehicles associated with the state template will stream telemetry data when there is a change.

parameters.name: stateTemplatesToRemove
parameters.description: Remove state templates from the vehicle. (string) ---

parameters.name: stateTemplatesToUpdate
parameters.description: Change the stateTemplateUpdateStrategy of state templates already associated with the vehicle. (dict) --- The state template associated with a vehicle. State templates contain state properties, which are signals that belong to a signal catalog that is synchronized between the Amazon Web Services IoT FleetWise Edge and the Amazon Web Services Cloud. The unique ID of the state template. The update strategy for the state template. Vehicles associated with the state template can stream telemetry data with either an onChange or periodic update strategy. periodic (dict) --- Vehicles associated with the state template will stream telemetry data during a specified time period. The length of time between state template updates. A unit of time. A number of time units. onChange (dict) --- Vehicles associated with the state template will stream telemetry data when there is a change.
